    Description
    AppointmentInputValidation
    This validates the inputs for the Appointment-related FXML forms.
    CustomerInputValidation
    This is a helper class that checks the add/modify customer inputs.
    Utilities
    This is a helper class that stores instance variables that couldn't be stored in the actual FXML view, and methods that were reused across views.
